p: (2) We complemented this information with articles in the main colonial and tropical medicine journals (Ann Méd Pharm Coloniales, Ann Hyg Méd Coloniales, Bull Soc Pathol Exotique), and additional articles and books on the subject. Particularly important was a series of annual articles in Ann Méd Pharm Coloniales, covering health data in French colonies and territories under administration in the period 1927–1936 [ 87, 88, 89, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 97].
